body.name: DeerValley DV-1F026 Ally Dual Flush Elongated Toilet with Soft Close Seat, High-Efficiency Supply, White Finish
features: ✅[Modern Design]: Modern standard one piece toilet,sleek ADA height design---stylish, nice, great, terrific lines perfectly suitable for your modern design bathroom.

✅[Easy to Claen]: The white toilets glazed surface is self-cleaning, simplifying maintenance. It is very easy to reach for cleaning .Elongated one-piece toilet skirted design, easier to maintain versus a two-piece toilet.

✅[Siphon Flushing]: Highly efficient dual-flush toilet allows you to proactively conserve water by selecting 0.8 GPF or higher(1.28gpf) for tougher jobs.Dual flush toilet fully glazed flush,Super-quiet and powerful flush with no clogs. Leak-proof.

✅[Easy Install]: The toilet is easily installed,it can more Convenient.Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose,this toilet will come with a supply line connector(adapter) for you to connect the supply line and toilet. If your supply line size is 7/8", you could directly connect your water line to the toilet. If your supply line size is 1/2", please screw off the adapter, then connect it.
✅ [All-In-One Package]: Package includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instruction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful with No Clogs & Save water Siphon flush with two options. The full flush uses 1.28 gallons of water, while the light flush uses 0.8 gallons. That gives you plenty of power to ensure the bowl is clean and also saves on your water bill

Easily Installed & Allows for installation in any bathroom Two big installation access on the side allows the plumber to install this dual flush toilet much easier. Package includes toilet, soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instruction. Rough-in Option : 10" & 12"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Major Upgrade from What I Had
reviews.reviewText: After I moved into my new house, I looked for quick upgrades that I could do. The toilets seemed easy enough. Some of the criteria that I was looking for in a new toilet were chair height (I am 6'2") and easy to clean. This toilet checked off both of those boxes and was one of the more affordable ones that I found.It should be standard that all toilets that are primarily used by adults should be chair height. The full wrap around easy clean toilets are becoming more common. These toilets have the securing bolts hidden has a skirt that wraps around it. Some toilets require you to wrap your arm around from the back to secure the bolts. It does make the skirt easier to clean, but also the bolts extremely more difficult to secure. This toilet is much easier to install because it has access ports on each side of it that allows you to secure the bolts through.I was able to install the toilet by myself and that included cleaning out the old seal, installing a new seal, mounting and securing the toilet. It took me less than 25 minutes to do. It looks great.Some things to keep in mind is that the internal pieces of the toilet are integrated into the toilet, so it is nat as easy as fixing a traditional toilet. You just can't swap out a single component. Also, I ran into a major issue when I was installing the toilet. I have the toilet water supply valves that come out of the floor. I had to reposition the valve in order for the toilet to fit. It was a tight squeeze but I made it work.This is a decent toilet well worth your consideration as an upgrade. It is the evolution of the bathroom toilet and is the future. I recommend this toilet. It is simple enough to install, very comfortable, and cleaning it is a cinch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good value and design. Had to hire a plumber to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We love the look of this. But after having it for a year, the seat hinge is broken and I am at a loss for how to fix it, given the design and the fact that so much of the workings of this toilet are sealed on the inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small footprint; good flush
reviews.reviewText: I have two boys. And for the moms out there, they put a lot of things down the toilet. This toilet seems to be able to handle everything so far and it looks nice and is very easy to clean. I think the only disclaimer I have is that for somebody who has a little bit of arthritis, pushing down on the flusher is harder than a standard flusher? It’s not hard, but it’s not as easy as just holding down a handle because you do have to hold down the button to make it flush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and functional
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 3 of these to replace all toilets in my house. I've been using these for about 10 months, and they work perfectly. Also very stylish. They were easy to install and use a lot less water than the 30 year old toilets I was using. 100% satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Install and Function
reviews.reviewText: So, I gave it only 1 star because of installation and function. I said terrible if you do not have "COMPLETE" ample room on both sides of the toilet, then this toilet is "NOT" for you. in the install video it is very easy because there is "NOTHING" around it. Sure, but that is not the case in 95% of homes. I have removed and installed many toilets but this one was the "ONLY" difficult one. the difficulty is in placing it where it belongs. most especially that it completely has the shut off valve behind the toilet. with no room even behind the toilet to turn on the valve after placing it, I had to get a 20" hose and turn the water valve on "BEFORE" placing the toilet. once that is done, the rest is fine and the toilet looks great. Then, you come to use it. If you use the #1 button it doesnt flush that all the way. So you can imagine how it is for #2. People like me write reviews for a reason and that is for others not to fall for the fancy ads. this is a final review edit after few months of using it. I am getting rid of it.

reviews.reviewerName: the best!! a very good purchase, great qualitythe best!! a very good purchase, great quality

reviews.reviewText: The toilet was easy to install and easy to clean. The duel flush is great. They delivered it and put it in hall by our bathroom. It was great.
